structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Disposition of fees collected by commissioner.
law.text: All license and certificate fees and charges collected by the commissioner under the provisions of KRS 198B.550 to 198B.630 and the rules and regulations of the commissioner adopted hereunder, shall be paid to the State Treasury and credited to a trust and agency fund to be used by the commissioner's office in carrying out the provisions of KRS 198B.550 to 198B.630. Any money in the trust and agency fund at the end of the fiscal year shall lapse to the general fund of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 283, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 383, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984.
